Font Cache generator is command line tool used to create `*.fontcache` files (see FontCacheFile).

OSX & WIN32 executable are available.

It is build with [http://code.google.com/p/redtamarin/ redtamarin]

= Usage =

{{{
fcgen
Usage: fcgen [OPTIONS]... FILE [OUTPUT]
Generate font cache from font embed in SWF file.

  -i, --font-index=INDEX        specify zero based index of font in SWF file to
output
  -l, --font-list       display font list contained in SWF file and exit
  -v, --verbose         verbose mode
  -h, --help            display this help and exit
      --version         output version information and exit

If OUTPUT and -i argument are not specified, export all font found in SWF file.
}}}

Supported options :

  * `-i 2` or `--font-index=2` used for export font number 2 (zero based index: 2 = the third)
  * `-l` or `--font-list` used to list all font embedded in SWF file
  * `-v` or `--verbose` used to output others informations (headers, performances...)

List all fonts

{{{
fcgen -l gskinner_quick_talk.swf
Embed fonts: 6
  0:    Hiragino Kaku Gothic Pro W3 (85 glyphs)
  1:    _sans (0 glyphs)
  2:    Courier (69 glyphs)
  3:    Lucida Grande (1 glyphs)
  4:    #HeadLineA Regular (0 glyphs)
  5:    Futura Condensed Medium (21 glyphs)
}}}

Export the third font

{{{
fcgen -i 2 gskinner_quick_talk.swf
Courier_regular.fontcache generated (13628 bytes)
}}}

Export all fonts

{{{
fcgen gskinner_quick_talk.swf
Hiragino Kaku Gothic Pro W3_regular.fontcache generated (12302 bytes)
No glyphs found, skip _sans
Courier_regular.fontcache generated (13628 bytes)
Lucida Grande_bold.fontcache generated (135 bytes)
No glyphs found, skip #HeadLineA Regular
Futura Condensed Medium_regular.fontcache generated (2804 bytes)
}}}
